elements.text:
The spr() function draws a sprite (either from
userdata, or from an index in the gfx editor).

This draws sprite indexed at 1 on x=30 and y=12,
and flipped horizontally.

n
  The index for a sprite (or a variable with 2d
  userdata)
x
  The x of where the sprite's upper left corner
  will be.
y
  The y of where the sprite's upper left corner
  will be.
flph (bool)
  Tf true, the sprite will be flipped
  horizontally.
flpv (bool)
  If true, the sprite will be flipped
  vertically.
